application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: DISIA Surbiton District Centre Inset Area
ART4 Surbiton District Centre Inset Area

decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted pursuant to Conditions: 3, 4 and 6 to demonstrate that the development would safeguard the amenities of neighbours, highway safety and the free flow of traffic during construction works; that any drainage systems on site would be safeguarded during piling; and that the development would have a satisfactory appearance on completion; contrary to Policy DM10 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012).
description: Details required for Conditions 3 (Construction Management Plan), 4 (Piling Method Statement), 6 (Sample Facing Materials), 7 (Noise Insulation), 8 (Window Framework), and 11 (Off-Street Parking) of planning permission 21/02702/FUL (Demolition of single storey storage building and construction of two storey building consisting of 2no. one-bedroom and 2no. two-bedroom self-contained units in existing car park with associated amenity space and cycle parking provision)
